```{r}
db %>%

```

## problem 1
Compute the number of all films for each production_year. Your result should be a data.frame with two columns: production_year and num_films.
```{r}
db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT * FROM title
             WHERE title = 'Unforgiven'
             AND production_year = 1992;")
```

```{r}
n2 <- 
  db%>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT * 
             FROM title
             WHERE production_year = 1992;")
nrow(n2)
```
Compute the number of all films for each production_year. Your result should be a data.frame with two columns: production_year and num_films

```{r}
number_of_films <- function (name_arg="1992")
  db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT * 
             FROM title
             WHERE production_year = name_arg;") %>%
nrow(name_arg)
number_of_films(name_arg="2000")
```
